channel.title: [Build A Class]The Unknown
channel.description:
Build a class together. collaborative build !
Help me complete this new class suggestion ! If you want to join in copy the bottom entry from the thread and replace one [bracket] with the text you think we should see there . I have gotten started and decided this guy will be blue dragon !
[NAME] ( blue dragon / [class])
[Ability Type][Ability 1 name][Ability description]
[Ability Type][Ability 2 name][Ability description]
[Ability Type][Ability 3 name][Ability description]
[Ability Type][Ability 4 name][Ability description]
[lore]
